definition: to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to meet one's senior or superior
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Afternoon - Barack and Michelle Obama go for private audience with the Queen
sentences.chinese: 下午，奧巴馬伕婦作爲私人訪客拜見女王？。

sentences.english: It is said that the victorious general waited upon the king yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 據說那位得勝歸來的將軍昨天拜見了國王。

sentences.english: Beijing was built to show off the power of the emperor and leave visitors in awe.
sentences.chinese: 作爲皇權的象徵，北京讓拜見者心生敬畏。

sentences.english: US Shaolin Fist Union student pays his respects to the Shaolin master.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲美國少林拳法聯盟的學員在拜見少林師傅。

sentences.english: Arriving in Egypt, Frederick met the sultan, a fellow sceptic in religious questions.
sentences.chinese: 抵達埃及後，腓特烈拜見了宗教懷疑論者同伴蘇丹。
